Automatic Text Analysis .A Salton, G. In this article the principal experiments in automatic text analysis are briefly reviewed, and an indication is given of developments to be expected in the future. .X 38	2	1294 51	2	1294 63	1	1294 69	2	1294 71	1	1294 72	2	1294 75	3	1294 77	3	1294 78	1	1294 79	5	1294 81	1	1294 82	1	1294 84	1	1294 89	1	1294 105	1	1294 110	1	1294 149	1	1294 155	1	1294 157	1	1294 168	2	1294 175	5	1294 176	1	1294 314	1	1294 315	2	1294 317	1	1294 320	1	1294 348	1	1294 356	1	1294 382	4	1294 389	1	1294 390	1	1294 419	1	1294 441	2	1294 448	2	1294 480	1	1294 483	1	1294 484	1	1294 486	1	1294 487	1	1294 488	4	1294 489	2	1294 490	2	1294 491	3	1294 492	2	1294 493	3	1294 494	1	1294 495	1	1294 496	2	1294 497	2	1294 498	2	1294 499	2	1294 500	1	1294 502	1	1294 503	1	1294 507	1	1294 509	1	1294 510	1	1294 512	1	1294 514	2	1294 517	1	1294 520	1	1294 522	1	1294 527	1	1294 528	1	1294 531	2	1294 544	1	1294 554	1	1294 560	1	1294 565	4	1294 566	2	1294 570	1	1294 575	1	1294 577	1	1294 579	1	1294 581	4	1294 582	1	1294 583	2	1294 584	1	1294 586	2	1294 596	2	1294 600	1	1294 601	1	1294 603	1	1294 608	3	1294 609	1	1294 633	1	1294 636	1	1294 643	1	1294 644	1	1294 649	1	1294 656	1	1294 659	4	1294 660	2	1294 685	1	1294 715	1	1294 726	1	1294 752	1	1294 754	1	1294 762	1	1294 780	1	1294 790	2	1294 795	2	1294 796	1	1294 798	1	1294 799	1	1294 801	1	1294 805	2	1294 807	2	1294 809	1	1294 810	2	1294 812	2	1294 813	1	1294 814	1	1294 817	1	1294 824	3	1294 825	1	1294 863	1	1294 864	1	1294 894	2	1294 902	1	1294 906	1	1294 907	1	1294 956	3	1294 961	1	1294 963	1	1294 986	1	1294 987	1	1294 988	1	1294 989	1	1294 1030	1	1294 1035	1	1294 1050	1	1294 1051	1	1294 1062	1	1294 1089	1	1294 1144	2	1294 1152	1	1294 1209	1	1294 1255	1	1294 1256	1	1294 1265	1	1294 1282	1	1294 1284	1	1294 1285	1	1294 1289	1	1294 1290	1	1294 1291	1	1294 1293	1	1294 1294	19	1294 1295	1	1294 1296	1	1294 1297	1	1294 1298	1	1294 1319	1	1294 1327	4	1294 1346	1	1294 1386	1	1294 1419	1	1294 1427	1	1294 1443	1	1294 1443	1	1294
